Package com.example.networkmeup.daoMemory

Class EmployerDAOMemory

java.lang.Object
com.example.networkmeup.daoMemory.EmployerDAOMemory
All Implemented Interfaces:
EmployerDAO
public class EmployerDAOMemory extends Object implements EmployerDAO
EmployerDAOMemory class implements the EmployerDAO interface and manages employer-related data in memory.
